snippet: Warren Buffett's right-hand man, Charles Munger, recently gave 10 shares of Berkshire Hathaway to the University of Michigan.
abstract: Warren Buffett's right-hand man, Charles Munger, recently gave 10 shares of Berkshire Hathaway to the University of Michigan.
lead_paragraph: Gifting 10 shares of company stock might seem like a small amount to a university. But it's a different story when Charles T. Munger, the longtime vice chairman of Berkshire Hathaway, is the donor.

headline.main: Munger Donates $1.2 Million to University of Michigan
